edu.utsa.mobbed
Class Attributes

Object
  Attributes

public class Attributes
extends Object

Handler class for ATTRIBUTES table. Attributes, which do not have timestamps, may encapsulate entity metadata or other characteristics as well as time independent data.

Author:
Arif Hossain, Jeremy Cockfield, Kay Robbins

          Creates a Attributes object.

Method Detail

addToBatch

public void addToBatch()
                throws MobbedException

reset

public void reset(UUID attributeUuid,
                  UUID entityUuid,
                  String entityClass,
                  UUID organizationalUuid,
                  String organizationalClass,
                  UUID structureUuid,
                  Double numericValue,
                  String value)
Sets the class fields of a Attributes object.

Parameters:
attributeUuid - UUID of the attribute
entityUuid - UUID of the entity associated with the attribute
entityClass - name of the entity table associated with the attribute
organizationalUuid - UUID of the organization associated with the attribute
organizationalClass - name of the organizational table associated with the attribute
structureUuid - UUID of the structure associated with the attribute
numericValue - numeric representation of the attribute value
value - string representation of the attribute value

save

public void save()
          throws MobbedException
Saves all attributes as a batch. All attributes in the batch will be successfully written or the operation will be aborted.

Throws:
MobbedException - if an error occurs
